phrs.translation: 两位或两位以上女子, 夫人, 女士们
贵夫人咖啡, 贵妇人咖啡

sentences.sentence: My Mesdames began preparing for it months in advance.
sentences.translation: 女主人们从好几个月前就开始准备。

sentences.sentence: My Mesdames handed me the envelope on a small silver tray.
sentences.translation: 女主人将信放在小银盘上递给我。

sentences.sentence: Mesdames (to the dowagers), you will take cold to a dead certainty, if you stay in this chill gallery any longer.
sentences.translation: 夫人们(向着两位遗孀)，要是你们在冷嗖嗖的走廊上再呆下去，那肯定要得感冒。
